Kapolri Jenderal Idham: Saya Wakafkan Diri Beri yang Terbaik untuk Polri
06 Nov 2019, 09:14 by Matius Alfons
Jakarta - Mantan Kapolri Jenderal Purnawirawan Tito Karnavian menyerahkan panji tribrata Polri kepada Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis. Dalam kesempatan ini, Tito juga menitipkan tugas-tugas yang belum selesai kepada Idham.
Pantauan detikcom, upacara serah terima panji tribrata Polri dilaksanakan di lapangan Mako Brimob, Cimanggis, Depok, Rabu (6/11/2019), pukul 07.40 WIB. Terlihat hadir dalam acara Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto, Wakapolri Komjen Ari Dono, Ketua MPR RI Bambang Seosatyo, Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dan pejabat lainnya.
Terlihat pukul 07.50 WIB, Muhammad Tito Karnavian bersama Idham Azis melakukan serah terima panji tribrata Polri. Terlihat bendera panji tribrata Polri diserahkan oleh Tito kepada Idham.
"Pagi ini kita bisa laksanakan prosesi tradisi di Polri yaitu serah panji-panji tribrata Polri, upacara ini simbol beralihnya estafet kepemimpinan," kata Idham saat memberi sambutan di hadapan personel TNI dan Polri.
Idham berjanji akan mewakafkan dirinya untuk memimpin Polri dan melanjutkan program Kapolri sebelumnya. Dia juga mengatakan akan bersama TNI mengawal NKRI.
"Amanah ini tanggung jawab dan saya akan wakafkan diri saya selama 14 bulan ke depan untuk beri yang terbaik pada institusi Polri. Saya akan lanjutkan seluruh program yang dicanangkan Pak Kapolri sebelumnya dan saya mantapkan soliditas TNI Polri sebagai bagian pilar NKRI yang telah mengkristal untuk mengawal NKRI ini," ucapnya.
Idham juga meminta doa restu dan bantuan seluruh pihak yang dalam menjalankan kepemimpinan. Dia juga mengucapkan selamat kepada Tito yang menjabat sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri.
"Saya mohon doa restu pada hadirin sekalian semoga amanah ini bisa saya emban dengan baik. Saya sadar betul tanpa bantuan bapak ibu tidak mungkin polisi bisa jalan sendiri, kepada pak Mendagri kami ucapkan selamat bertugas di tempat yang baru, Institusi Polri akan backup bapak seluruhnya, akan beri pengamanan bapak dimanapun berada," sebutnya.
Sementara itu, mantan Kapolri sekaligus Mendagri Tito mengucapkan selamat kepada Idham. Dia juga mengingatkan tugas sebagai Kapolri tidak akan mudah.
"Saya juga ucapkan selamat bertugas pada rekan saya Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis, penugasan ini amanah dari Allah yang disampaikan melalui Pak Presiden. Tantangan tugas ke depan saya yakin sudah dinilai cukup berat," ucapnya.
Tito mengingatkan Idham soal Pilkada 2020 di 170 daerah, PON di Papua dan potensi gangguan Kamtibmas di tengah dinamika bermasyarakat. Dia juga menyerahkan tugas-tugas yang belum selesai kepada Idham.
"Banyak tugas tugas diselesaikan, namun banyak juga kerjaan yang belum selesai di masa saya, karena itu saya percaya Kapolri baru dapat selesaikan tugas-tugas yang belum selesai," sebut Tito.

National Police Chief Gen. Idham: I Endow myself Give the Best for the Police
Nov 6 2019, 09:14 by Matthew Alfons
Jakarta - Former National Police Chief Retired Tito Karnavian handed the tribrata banner of the National Police to National Police Chief General Idham Azis. On this occasion, Tito also entrusted Idham with unfinished tasks.
The AFP monitoring, the handover ceremony of the National Police tribrata flag was held at the Mako Brimob field, Cimanggis, Depok, Wednesday (11/06/2019), at 07:40 WIB. Seen at the TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto, Deputy Chief of National Police Comr. Gen. Ari Dono, Chairman of the Indonesian MPR Bambang Seosatyo, DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan and other officials.
Seen at 07.50 WIB, Muhammad Tito Karnavian and Idham Azis handed over the tribrata banner of the National Police. Tito's flag was seen as being handed over by Tito to Idham.
"This morning we can carry out a procession of tradition in the Indonesian National Police that is the handover of the tribrata banner of the Indonesian National Police, this ceremony symbolizes the change of leadership relay," Idham said while giving a speech in the presence of TNI and Polri personnel.
Idham promised to endow himself to lead the National Police and continue the previous National Police program. He also said that he would be with the TNI to escort the Republic of Indonesia.
"This mandate is a responsibility and I will endow myself for the next 14 months to give the best to the Polri institutions. I will continue all the programs that were put in place by the previous Chief of Police and I will establish the solidarity of the Indonesian National Police as part of the pillars of the Republic of Indonesia which has crystallized to oversee the Republic of Indonesia. this, "he said.
Idham also asked for the blessing and assistance of all parties in carrying out leadership. He also congratulated Tito, who served as Minister of the Interior.
"I ask for your blessing to all of you, I hope this mandate can be carried out properly. I am fully aware that without the help of ladies and gentlemen, the police cannot walk on their own, to the Minister of Home Affairs, we congratulate him on duty in a new place. "I will give you security wherever you are," he said.
Meanwhile, former National Police Chief and Minister of Domestic Affairs Tito congratulated Idham. He also warned that the task as the National Police Chief would not be easy.
"I also congratulate my colleague Chief of Police General Idham Azis, this assignment is mandatory from God delivered through the President. The challenge of the task ahead is I believe it has been considered quite heavy," he said.
Tito reminded Idham about the 2020 elections in 170 regions, PON in Papua and the potential disruption of Kamtibmas in the midst of social dynamics. He also handed over unfinished tasks to Idham.
"Many tasks have been completed, but there are many jobs that have not been completed in my time, therefore I believe the new National Police Chief can finish the tasks that have not been completed," said Tito.
